ACRCLOUD_ACCESS_SECRET=your_acrcloud_access_secret_here

NODE_ENV=production

# Generate with: openssl rand -hex 32
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
JWT_SECRET=your_secure_jwt_secret_here_CHANGE_IN_PRODUCTION
JWT_EXPIRES_IN=24h
JWT_REFRESH_EXPIRES_IN=7d
